alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oneida County through 200 PM EDT... At 112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yorkville, or near Utica, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Kirkland, Trenton, Deerfield, Floyd, Whitesboro, New York Mills, Yorkville and Clinton. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
